channel.title: Welcome on Jordan Herzstein
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on Jordan Herzstein

item.title: Hosting your own Fonts and Accessable Theme Preferences
item.description: Hosting fonts on the website while cutting out the middle-man, and allowing site themes to work with and without javascript.

item.title: This Site Is Not Written By AI
item.description: It may be slop, but it’s slop made by ME.

item.title: Welcome to YortNet
item.description: I spun up a vps to host various services and privacy front ends

item.title: Minecraft Java Edition Server For Free
item.description: Minecraft free forever in a docker container with 24 GB of ram and 4 CPU cores.

item.title: Booting DietPi on an SSD and installing Home Assistant in Docker
item.description: Setting up home assistant with docker compose on a Raspberry Pi 4 running DietPi.

item.title: New email/website domain!
item.description: Friendship with .xyz has ended, .com is my new best friend. Friendship with namecheap has ended, porkbun is my new best friend

item.title: Using adb to Delete Vanadium on GrapheneOS
item.description: I wanted to delete the system browser app Vanadium on my phone running Grapheneos for productivity and mental health reasons. Do this at your own risk.

item.title: Eclipse Sun Worm
item.description: My very bad photos of the eclipse brought us an accidental masterpiece.

item.title: My Eclipse PSA
item.description: Do not look directly at the sun today… or tomorrow… or ever… just don’t do it.

item.title: New light theme on daylight savings plus I hate daylight savings
item.description: I added a light theme so it’s easier for some users to read. Also I hate daylight savings.

item.title: Skiff is Dead ðŸ¤¡
item.description: Lesson #1: Proton king. Lesson #2: Don’t trust American Silicon Valley Crypto Bros. Lesson #3: Switching seems to be the primary throughline of my website.

item.title: Hugo and other site changes
item.description: Hugo is a very good static site generator.

item.title: nyaa_menu
item.description: I made a lazy web scraping tool for collecting anime and manga while I was bored.

item.title: My Little Techy Projects Summer 2023
item.description: I did some fun stuff this summer, including hacking my switch, switching to Qubes OS, and switching to OpenWRT on my router. Overall, a lot of switching.

item.title: Mapping Caps Lock to Esc and CTRL in Xorg
item.description: Guide on switching keymaps using xkb in Xorg
